snippet.title: GLOOMY EYES (2019) — Official Trailer
snippet.description:
In a world where the sun decides to hide and never rise again, a zombie boy falls in love with a human girl, their improbable love struggles in a world where the living and the dead cannot peacefully coexist. 

GLOOMY EYES is an animated, award-winning VR experience in 6DoF & 3D real time, releasing in 3 volumes.

Awarded ‘Best VR experience’ at the Annecy International Animation Film Festival (2019) and winner of the ‘Jury Award for Storytelling’ at SXSW (2019).

Narrated by Colin Farrell (English), Jam Hsiao (Mandarin), Tahar Rahim (French), Max Riemelt (German) and Jorge Drexler (Spanish).
